roleset.name: dip
roleset.note: SCOOP-V NOTES: Comparison with 'dip'. Member of Vncls funnel-9.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from scoop.01-v)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The guide scoops into a pail and puts a frantically wiggling croaker on the hook .

example.name: all args
example.text: She just scooped ice cream into bowls and cones.

roleset.name: acquire
roleset.note: SCOOP_UP-V NOTES: frames created by Olga. No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from scoop.02-v)

example.name: with locative PP
example.text: [*-1] Attracted [*-2]by low prices and encouraged [*-2] by New York 's performance , they-1 scooped up equities across the board .
example.arg: [*-1] Attracted [*-2]by low prices and encouraged [*-2] by New York 's performance

example.name: with temporal adverbial
example.text: Pension funds , insurers and other behemoths of the investing world said they-1 began [*-1] scooping up stocks during Friday 's market rout .
